name: Carly and the Reaperman - Escape from the Underworld
description: Join the adventure of Carly and the Reaperman in the Underworld! Master platforming to avoid dangers, solve puzzles and build your way to through dozens of fun and challenging obstacles to the finish line - play alone or with a friend!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 9xx-series or equal graphics card DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 10xx-series graphics card or equal DirectX: Version 11 Additional Notes: Using a gamepad is highly recommended although playing on the keyboard is possible
